external_games.name: RTK14: Scenario [Battle of Tong Gate] & Event Set

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - Battle of Tong Gate & Event Set
summary: A scenario and set of events are added to "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV". This scenario takes place after the Battle of Chibi. Players can enjoy the fierce battles of Cao Cao and the vengeance-seeking Ma Chao, Jia Xu's estrange plot, Liu Bei's entry into Shu, and other famous scenes.
